question: Who will be honoured with the RedInk Award for Lifetime Achievement in Journalism for 2017?
explanation: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis will present the RedInk Award for Lifetime Achievement in Journalism for 2017 to veteran journalist Vinod Dua on June 7 in Mumbai. The award, a part of the National RedInk Awards for Excellence in Journalism, and instituted by the Mumbai Press Club, will be presented at a ceremony in Jamshed Bhaba Hall, NCPA.
